# GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersions | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersions ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-gamecenterappversions)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersions 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersions

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-gamecenterappversions#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAppVersions
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-gamecenterappversions#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-gamecenterappversions#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-gamecenterappversions#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterDetailGameCenterAppVersionsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterdetailgamecenterappversionslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-gamecenterappversions#see-also)

### [Reading Game Center app versions](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-gamecenterappversions#Reading-Game-Center-app-versions)

[`Read app versions for a Game Center detail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-gamecenterappversions)Get a list of app versions for a Game Center detail.[`GET /v1/gameCenterAppVersions/{id}`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterappversions-_id_)Read the Game Center enablement state and related app version information.[`GET /v1/gameCenterAppVersions/{id}/appStoreVersion`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterappversions-_id_-appstoreversion)Read the app store version and related information for an app version.[`GET /v1/gameCenterAppVersions/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersion`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterappversions-_id_-relationships-appstoreversion)[`GET /v1/gameCenterAppVersions/{id}/compatibilityVersions`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterappversions-_id_-compatibilityversions)Get compatibility version information for a specific app version.[`GET /v1/gameCenterAppVersions/{id}/relationships/compatibilityVersions`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterappversions-_id_-relationships-compatibilityversions)List all compatible verisons for an app version.
